programme.desc: Lola Kartika dan Dato Rona saling bermusuhan. Sejarah berulang kembali apabila anak mereka, Ika Natalia dan Erma Erika merebut Syazwan. Sekali lagi perang melanda diantara Lola Kartika dan Dato Rona!

programme.title: Ragam Ep06
programme.desc: Kombinasi 5 sketsa pendek yang berlainan dan di lakonkan oleh artis artis yang berlainan. Setiap sketsa membawa tema, set up dan penceritaan yang berbeza mengenai ragam manusia.

programme.title: Oggy & the Cockroaches Ep22
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seekor kucing pemalas yang bernama Oggy. Dia suka menghabiskan hari-harinya dengan menonton televisyen dan makan. Tiga ekor lipas kecil, Joey, Marky dan Dee Dee suka menyerang peti sejuk Oggy

programme.title: Orang Ketiga S2 Ep98
programme.desc: Afifah, suri rumah hidup dalam kemewahan. Dia merasa hidupnya cukup sempurna, mempunyai seorang anak dan suami yang berkerjaya. Dia sering cemburu dan curiga pada perempuan muda, disekeliling suaminya.

programme.title: Cik Serba Tahu Ep02
programme.desc: Rakan-rakan sekerja di pejabat menggelarkan Aerna sebagai Cik Serba Tahu kerana semuanya dia boleh tahu. Sebab benda yang diagak selalunya betul dan banyak rahsia yang dia tahu

programme.title: Silsila Badalte Rishton Ka Ep31
programme.desc: Kunal merancang untuk membawa Mauli untuk keluar meraikan sesuatu. Mauli mengajak Nandhini untuk sertai mereka.

programme.title: Dia Semanis Honey Ep12
programme.desc: Ahnaf dan Hani masih belum berbaik. Tiba-tiba Ahnaf merajuk tanpa Hani tahu puncanya.

programme.title: Da Di Du
programme.desc: Tiga sahabat Badu, Badi, dan Bada yang baru berjumpa akibat kisah silam yang tidak menyebelahi lantas mereka mengambil keputusan untuk berguru dengan Tok Guru dan balik ke kampung untuk membalas dendam.

programme.title: Click Ep231

programme.desc: Betty Ting Pei plays a girl hiding from her father while working as a club singer in Japan. Then her father sends someone for her only for the man to fall in love with her.

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: Cheng Pei-pei turns human combine harvester as she hacks a path through life, avenging the death of her family under the moniker 'The Jade Raksha'.

programme.title: Default
programme.desc: Based on real-life events, this story features the different happenings in South Korea during the Asian Financial Crisis. Can they overcome the biggest crisis of the country?

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: The members of an internet suicide room decide to end their lives using explosives - but when every attempt somehow pushes them back in time, they suspect the issue to be their youngest member.

programme.title: Bio Raiders
programme.desc: A famed doctor concocts an elixir of immortality to save his terminally ill daughter, but it involves drinking human blood. Twenty years later, the doctor's assistant makes a terrifying discovery.

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Kara Hui makes her action film swansong by portraying a woman who will stop at nothing to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past resurface. Simon Yam & Wu Bai co-star.

programme.title: She Remembers, He Forgets
programme.desc: Recipient of a 2015 Film of Merit award, this drama stars Miriam Yeung as a middle-aged woman who attends a high school reunion, and finds her youth waiting.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2018
programme.desc: In this remake of John Woo's legendary production, a former drug smuggler tries to repair his relationship with his estranged brother, an up-and-coming star in the police force's narcotics division.

programme.title: Cook Up a Storm
programme.desc: Nicholas Tse & Jung Yong Hwa helm this blockbuster filmed in Guangzhou, Macau & Europe, about a Cantonese cook who takes on a Michelin-starred rival for a prestigious title.

programme.title: Run for Love
programme.desc: Starring Zhang Zi Yi, Eddie Peng, Zhou Dong Yu & Michelle Chen, this romantic anthology features five love stories set in Japan, Turkey, the US, Norway & Saipan, with five different directors.

programme.title: Foolish Plan
programme.desc: Lam Chi Chung from Shaolin Soccer delivers another wildly nonsensical Hong Kong comedy with rock singer Shin as a crazy soccer team captain who pushes his team to victory!

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk
programme.desc: Due in court as a witness the next morning, Alan still gets raging drunk with friends the night before. Unexpectedly, this twilight haze leads to surprises.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: As the Tang Dynasty declines, several rebel groups are established, with the largest being the House of Flying Daggers. Two officers are ordered to kill the elusive leader of the group.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman
programme.desc: There's no love lost between a plump manager & a charming lady but find themselves swapping bodies after getting struck by lightning.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learned boxing since young & uses his skills to help the weak. When his friend is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge to help him take revenge.
